message:
For WoW Classic we are playing on Gehennas as Horde. 
On Retail we are playing on Ravencrest as Alliance
Our Classic Guild is **Illuminati**, we are looking to do some casual raiding & dungeoning and hopefully experience all the classic content.

Use '!' followed by a word for text commands. 
Use '?' followed by a word for audio commands. 
To show all available commands use either !commands for text or ?commands for audio.

Rules: 
1. Don't be a dick! 
2. Don't Spam 
3. Don't invite people who aren't in the guild
